item: test1 - Title tag = to item title https://bobmovies.online/11-deadpool-online-free.html - Thumbanil = to link for icon image 500 x 500 px (.png / .jpg format) - Fanart = to link for background 720 x 1080 px (.png / jpg format) - Genere = to genre of the movie or clip - Date = to release date - Info = to information about the clip/movie
